name: Mairdie Herbert Bennett
bio: When Mairdie Herbert Bennett was born on 1 October 1883, in Alabama, United States, his father, John Perry Bennett, was 29 and his mother, Sarah Jane Spears, was 27. He married Frances Emma Hartley on 4 October 1905, in Covington, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 3 sons and 2 daughters. He lived in Butler, Alabama, United States in 1935 and Election Precinct 14 Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1940. He died on 26 March 1965, in Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 81, and was buried in Bethel Primitive Baptist Church Cemetery, Babbie, Covington, Alabama, United States.
